item.description:
It must be OCTOBER, cause Davey O is back in Cheshire!

 Come listen to and support this soulful musician who is debuting his new album!  At the same time sit and enjoy good food, coffee, wine, beer, dessert, and great conversation is the wonderful cozy Funky Monkey.

In Davey's own words:

Hello all my CT friends - I'm coming back your way for one night only in Cheshire at The Funky Monkey, armed with a top 20 CD in both the Folk DJ Charts (#20 right behind Mary Chapin Carpenter) AND the Roots Music Reports (#19 as of w/e 9/14/12) - only a $5.00 cover!!!!

----------------

Check out the Facebook Event http://www.facebook.com/#!/events/283340205100473/

and

the Funky Monkey Website for more info...  http://www.thefunkymonkeycafe.com/Welcome.html

----------------

There is a $5.00 cover charge for this event.

Can not wait to see you!
item.name: Get Funky at the Monkey with Davey O!!
